## Includes

```{r}
source(here::here('R/shared.R'))
```





## Example

```{r}
judges100_appts |> 
  group_by(judge_id) |> 
  # if you want to ensure they're in date order 
  arrange(nomination_date, .by_group = TRUE) |> 
  summarise(nominations = list(nomination_date)) |> 
  ungroup() 
 

```
